about_the_game:
You are faced with an arduous task to deliver the cargo safe and sound, because your final reward for delivery will depend on it. Along the way, you will encounter various dangers, such as bad weather, winding landscapes, and wild animals; only your skills will help you overcome those hardships. Get contracts, earn money, upgrade your equipment and your personal SUV to deliver the cargo intact. Find a balance between the courier and the SUV, since in some places you will have to drive, and in others – to walk.

Overcome

Equipment of the courier and the SUV includes only the items you might need on the way: a rope, an axe, an ice axe, parts for repairing the SUV, and much more. Courier characteristics system affects almost everything in the gameplay: carrying large loads, overcoming adverse weather conditions, avoiding bruises and sprains.

Earn

Earn money. It is the main resource for upgrading items and the SUV. There are various types of contracts, with the indication of the recommended vehicle, but if your SUV is broken and you urgently need money to fix it, the load can be carried on foot.
Each contract has its own difficulty level, and amount of reward depends on that level. Only you can choose what is best for the successful execution of the contract. Do not forget, the package must reach the pick-up point intact.

Improve

Your character's items (rope, ice axe, backpack, etc.) can be improved. Improvement makes the delivery of cargo to places inaccessible for SUV easier.
Calculate the amount of cargo a courier can carry; it is easier to delivery large cargo by SUV.



    Game features:
  • An open world with no limits, where you can build your own economy;
  • Development of the character and the SUV;
  • Dynamic change of day and night, weather and temperature will not let you get bored;
  • Influence of the environment on the character and the SUV, natural or man-made structures;
  • Wide range of courier, SUV, and shelter customization options;

name: Offroad Delivery Service

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: i5-4690K or FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: A courier and an off-road simulator rolled into one, where you are faced with an arduous task of delivering cargo of various sizes to distant and hard-to-reach places. Get contracts, earn money, upgrade your equipment and SUV.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
